channel.title: How can i make a Donater only shop?

item.title: How can i make a Donater only shop?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Michaelmmm:

bump still help?

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:4, topic:282717”]In the NPC second option packet, add something like this:

int npcid = 999999999; int shopID = 999999999; if(NPCID == npcid && isDonater == true) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = shopID; } [/quote]

AND

[quote=“jc22493, post:2, topic:282717”]if(variable == int) && (variable == int) { // Do stuff. else // Do stuff. }[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make a Donater only shop?
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

In the NPC second option packet, add something like this:

int npcid = 999999999;
int shopID = 999999999;
if(NPCID == npcid && isDonater == true) {
	PutNPCCoords = true;
	WanneShop = shopID;
}

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make a Donater only shop?

item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“Michaelmmm, post:1, topic:282717”]a shop that lets only donaters trade and says sorry u have to be a donater if u trade it and arent 1.

could u give me a example please?

i kno it has something to do with this:

}
if(NPCID == 2537) && donator ==0){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 5;
}
} else {
sM(“soz u need to b donater”);

would this work??[/quote]

Tell me you’re not serious…
